name: Guitar - Ample Guitar PF 4
description: Ample Sound Ample Guitar PF (AGPF) v4.x. Electric guitar instrument with keyswitch-based articulations, position/chord modes, string/position assignment, and dedicated FX noise keys.

ai.system_prompt_template:
Generate ELECTRIC GUITAR parts for Ample Sound Ample Guitar PF. Use guitar-specific techniques!

CURVES - USE THESE NAMES (not dynamics/expression):
- curves.vibrato (CC1) - interp: cubic. MANDATORY on long notes. Start at 0, rise to 50-80.
- curves.sustain_pedal (CC64) - interp: hold. ONLY 0 or 127, no intermediate values!

VIBRATO RULES:
- Add vibrato curve on ALL notes longer than 1 beat
- Breakpoints: time_q=0 value=0, then gradually rise to 50-80
- Without vibrato, long notes sound dead and artificial!

SUSTAIN PEDAL RULES:
- Use interp: hold, ONLY values 0 or 127
- Release (0) BEFORE chord change, press (127) on new chord
- Pattern: ON->play arpeggio->OFF before chord change->ON on new chord
- Never leave pedal on through chord changes - creates mud!

ARTICULATIONS (keyswitches) - insert keyswitch note BEFORE playing notes:
- PM (14): Palm Mute - chugging riffs, rhythmic patterns
- HP (17): Hammer-on/Pull-off - legato melodies, fast runs
- LS (16): Legato Slide - smooth note transitions
- SIO (15): Slide In/Out - expressive entries/exits
- PH (11): Pinch Harmonic - screaming accents
- NH (13): Natural Harmonic - chime effects
- Sus (12): Sustain - clean picking (default)

GUITAR PATTERNS:
- POWER CHORDS: Root+fifth, palm-muted, 8th notes
- ARPEGGIOS: Broken chords + sustain_pedal + vibrato on final note
- RIFFS: PM for tight, Sus for accents, HP for fills
- LEADS: HP/LS legato + vibrato on every long note
- FUNK: Muted 16ths (PM), open stabs (Sus)

OPEN STRINGS: E1(28), A1(33), D2(38), G2(43), B2(47), E3(52)

RANGE: 40 (E2) - 86 (D6) - use higher octave for guitar parts

DYNAMICS: velocity 60-100 normal, 100-127 accents, 40-60 ghost
ai.user_prompt_template:
!!! CRITICAL FOR GUITAR ARPEGGIOS !!!

DO NOT use curves.dynamics or curves.expression!

FOR ARPEGGIOS - sustain_pedal MUST cycle per chord:
Example 4 chords in 8 bars (2 bars each):
curves.sustain_pedal: interp=hold, breakpoints=[
  time_q=0 value=127,
  time_q=7.9 value=0,
  time_q=8 value=127,
  time_q=15.9 value=0,
  time_q=16 value=127,
  time_q=23.9 value=0,
  time_q=24 value=127,
  time_q=31.9 value=0
]

ARPEGGIO NOTES: short dur_q (0.5-1.0), pedal makes them ring!
NOT long overlapping notes - that is wrong!

curves.vibrato: for final held note only, start 0 rise to 60
